attributes.action: Stop the postcode lottery of life saving drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has recently been in the news that an RAF airman has been denied cancer drugs that could save his life. This drug is his last chance at survival as he is immune to others. He has already beaten cancer once but his local health trust is denying him the chance to survive it this time round. You cant play with peoples lives this way.
